title: Outer World Story: Basilisk of Ice Sculpture - Novel Updates

description:
Fourth Outer World Story:

In that world, there are people, gods, and monsters that take their vengeance on each other. This is a story that unfolds in one of the many city-states in such a world, beginning with a contract between a human boy and a God.>
